Life.Church cannot regulate other sites linked from within our various web sites and services.
These other sites may place their own cookies or other files on your computer, collect data or solicit personal information from you.
Third party sites This Privacy Policy applies only to sites and apps that are owned and operated by Life.Church.
You should familiarize yourself with their unique Privacy Policies, should you choose to visit their sites.
We don't share any personally identifiable information with social media companies, such as Facebook, in association with your UDID or GPS location.
